DOC.brief_summary: To assess the predictive value of circulating tumor cells (CTCs) for recurrence of advanced gastric cancer after radical resection. To identify the relationship between the detection of circulation tumor cells and recurrence patterns of gastric cancer after radical resection.
DOC.brief_title: Circulating Tumor Cells (CTCs) in Advanced Gastric Cancer
